documents2pdfsimulation.name: Convert Documents to PDF
documents2pdfsimulation.description: This simulation takes a sample of office documents of various formats from the CI-BER collection. It uses the same set of documents each time in order to allow performance comparisons. Adding one new user every second to reach 100 users, it attempts to convert the documents to PDFs.

legacyimage2tiffsimulation.name: Convert Legacy Images to TIFF
legacyimage2tiffsimulation.description: This simulation takes a sample of visual images in older formats. Same set each time allows performance comparison. Adding one new user every second to reach 100 users, it attempts to convert the images to TIFF, a preservation format.

documents2pdfcoveragesimulation.name: Find documents that do not convert PDF (Random Sampling)
documents2pdfcoveragesimulation.description: This simulation takes a new random sample of office documents of various formats from the CI-BER collection. Simulating 1000 users, it searches for documents that DAP cannot convert to PDF.

legacyimage2tiffcoveragesimulation.name: Find images that do not convert to TIFF (Random Sampling)
legacyimage2tiffcoveragesimulation.description: This simulation takes a new random sample of visual images in older formats. Simulating 1000 users, it searches for images the DAP cannot convert to TIFF, a preservation format.

extractcollectionsimulation.name: Extract Metadata for Collection
extractcollectionsimulation.description: This simulation posts 100 loosely related files from the same archival collection to the Data Tiling Service and polls for completed extraction jobs.

stresstestextraction.name: Stress Test of Extraction API
stresstestextraction.description: Over the course of 60 minutes this simulation ramps up from 10 users per second to 100 users per second. Each perform extractions for a sample file. New random files are used for each simulation run.

stresstestconversion.name: Stress Test of Conversion API
stresstestconversion.description: Over the course of 60 minutes this simulation ramps up from 10 users per second to 100 users per second. Each perform a listed conversion for a sample file. New random files are used for each simulation run.
